Fully Connected (Dense)¶

Layer architecture¶

class nnlibs.dense.models.Dense(nodes=2, activate=<function sigmoid>, initialization=<function xavier>)[source]¶

Bases: nnlibs.commons.models.Layer

Definition of a dense layer prototype.

Parameters

  • nodes (int) – Number of nodes for dense layer.

  • activate (function) – Activation function for output of nodes.

  • initialization (function) – Weight initialization function for dense layer.

compute_shapes(A)[source]¶
def dense_compute_shapes(layer, A):
    """Compute shapes for Dense layer object

    :param layer: An instance of the :class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    :type layer: class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    """

    X = A

    layer.fs['X'] = X.shape

    layer.d['p'] = layer.fs['X'][0]
    layer.d['m'] = layer.fs['X'][1]

    nm = layer.fs['W'] = (layer.d['n'], layer.d['p'])
    n1 = layer.fs['b'] = (layer.d['n'], 1)

    return None
forward(A)[source]¶
def dense_forward(layer, A):
    """

    :param layer: An instance of the :class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    :type layer: class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`

    :param A: Output of forward propagation from previous layer
    :type A: class:`numpy.ndarray`

    :return: Output of forward propagation for current layer
    :rtype: class:`numpy.ndarray`
    """

    X = initialize_forward(layer, A)

    Z = layer.fc['Z'] = np.dot(layer.p['W'], X) + layer.p['b']

    A = layer.fc['A'] = layer.activate(Z)

    return A    # To next layer
backward(dA)[source]¶
def dense_backward(layer, dA):
    """Compute shapes for Dense layer object

    :param layer: An instance of the :class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    :type layer: class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    """

    dX = initialize_backward(layer, dA)

    dZ = layer.bc['dZ'] = dX * layer.activate(layer.fc['Z'], deriv=True)

    dA = layer.bc['dA'] = np.dot(layer.p['W'].T, dZ)

    return dA
compute_gradients()[source]¶
def dense_compute_gradients(layer):
    """Update weight and bias gradients for Dense layer object

    :param layer: An instance of the :class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    :type layer: class:`nnlibs.dense.models.Dense`
    """

    # X - Input of forward propagation
    X = layer.fc['X']
    # dZ - Gradient of the cost with respect to the linear output of forward propagation (Z)
    dZ = layer.bc['dZ']

    # dW - Gradient of the cost with respect to weight (W)
    dW = layer.g['dW'] = 1./ layer.d['m'] * np.dot(dZ, X.T)
    # db - Gradient of the cost with respect to biais (b)
    db = layer.g['db'] = 1./ layer.d['m'] * np.sum(dZ, axis=1, keepdims=True)

    return None
